description: After the events at the hospital, Kagari’s obsessive attachment to Yomi is gone for some reason. Released from Kagari’s grip, Yomi and Mato become closer to each other. In fact, between Yomi and Mato’s best friend, Yu, it looks like everything is going well for Mato at school, even though the captain of her basketball team, Arata, makes her train hard. But then, why does Yomi look at Mato with mixed emotions? And in the other world, Black★Rock Shooter battles Black Gold Saw and routs a colony of glowing-eyed girls.

titles.title: Koraeta Namida ga Afuresou na no
Tears Held Back Threaten to Spill Over
こらえた涙があふれそうなの
